TopicTitle: Gold Stingray Inc. Spacecraft Division [New: Cygnus, Azure Kite, Azure Orca]

Articles.Content: Alrighty then. Tell me what to make and I will make it better. 8)

no problem, i just failed with mumech, but i got it into escape velocity, with 1/6 fuel left + 1500 kg for the descent stage.. pictures will follow, my game just crashed ???

Edit: 750 kg, but 1500 would be no problem, i think.. The rocket doesn\'tt wobble a bit

This should be a commercial of ours 'were not trying to takeover the world '*a flash showing kerbin formation like Germans in ww2*'that was nothin to worry about' *in distiller your hear 'hail jeb'

This was a joke no offense to anyone
You know with such a big crew we should be popping out planes like daisies *insert Milan refrence*
I was interested whilst waiting for my request so I made a plane of my own that fulfils it. I\'ll PM Luigi with it: you guys can have it as a donation. Enjoy!
Wow bimp, looking pretty good!
Does any one now how to make guided missiles

@Millst0ne MK II

Did you get the PM with the .craft file?

Yeah Bimp, I got the SFS presistance code!

Can I have a .craft that I can put in my ships folder?
i\'ts all dropbox\'s fault!!!! Now it should go ???

Alrighty then. Tell me what to make and I will make it better. 8)

MAKE THE BIGGEST BOMBER YOU CAN

MAKE THE BIGGEST BOMBER YOU CAN

Biggest plane or plane that can carry most bombs or missiles? (already did that)

I would like to present you:

The B-302 Storm

Capable of Trans-Oceanic flights (and more) with 6x 500kg Standard Fuel Tanks

Needs flying skills to take it of the ground, because of the Payload, but behaves very well, once in air. Just don\'t expect it to be very agile, it\'s a Bomber .

Craft file will be sent after someone requests it. Feel free to experiment with the design!

Its.....HUGE!

Good Job, ask luigi if he can put it under 'Heavy Bombers' on the front page.

I did something like this, dubbed the 'E-945 Albatross' it only got of the ground once. All following launches where catastrophic failures!

Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies
speaking of huge...

Bit slow on orders today.....

even though we gained several new employees!

Yay!

Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies

Order;

Using Damned Areospace, Damned Robotics, Cart & NovaPunch.

Could i have a Heavy lifting helicopter that is easy to fly, that can carry vehicles mounted underneath so that i can land the vehicles along the runway sides.

(I\'m trying to create runway lights )

Interesting. that might take a while though... BUT I SHALL TRY!

NOTE: I am finding Novapunch is not nesacary.

WOOT! ITS DONE! note: due to lack of rubber, there is no carts, but you can add them.

FLYING INSTRUCTIONS:

turn on ASAS

set throttle to 0

press space.

turn off turbines.

wait till 60 M/S and engage turbines

Fly!

use 9/0 to ajust pitch of jets.

LANDING NOTE:

this is as close as a VTOL i could get. when landing, ALWAYS keep bolth engines on. do NOT slow down to under 10 m/s or it will go crazy. same with takeoff. You need to get up to 60 M/S to get off without going crazy.

PICS:

flying!!!

landed, but lost 3 turbines. i ought to be more carefull on landing. maybe raise the gear. (you can do that )
Heres the .craft
good job!
Thanks! have you tried it? it needs dammned robotics and dammned aerospace. quite a hard thing to fly, but once you get used to it, its good.
i\'m currently working on the E-945 Albatross. Would you like the .craft to help me work on it?
Could u first send me a pic of it in the SPH? id like to see.

sure. It is kind of hard to control. That\'s what I want to fix. To take off, turn on SAS and throttle at 40%-50% press and hold the 's' key at the end of the runway, and right before the ocean, it should slope upward. Then retract landing gear.

No mods required.

Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies

sure. It is kind of hard to control. That\'s what I want to fix. To take off, turn on SAS and throttle at 40%-50% press and hold the 's' key at the end of the runway, and right before the ocean, it should slope upward. Then retract landing gear.

No mods required.

Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies

try taking the wings and making them level.
